title: Flamingals Wide Leg Jeans for Women Drawsting Mid Waist Baggy Jeans Belted Wash Stitch Detai Trouser Jeans
description: Stylish and comfortable: These flamingo wide leg jeans feature a drawstring mid waist and a relaxed, baggy fit for all-day comfort.
Adjustable fit: The included belt allows you to cinch in the waist for a customized fit that flatters your figure.
Trendy details: These wide leg trouser jeans feature a unique wash and stitch detail for a fashion-forward look that's sure to turn heads.
Versatile styling: Pair these jeans with a casual tee for a laid-back look, or dress them up with a blouse and heels for a night out.
Quality construction: Made from high-quality materials, these jeans are designed to last and withstand daily wear.
